name: Tueri Regnum
description:
Take leadership over the Kingdom's forces and lead them to victory. Gather resources, build up your armies and take back the realm. Will you fight against the empire or be trampled under their assault?

The game is broken down much like Chess!

     - The Empire has a large number of troops at their disposal so you must be careful so that you can use your forces to defeat them. Do not be too cautious as it is only a matter of time before you are discovered by the empires Scouts and will come under siege from the Empires Forces

     This game will be showcased at the 2021 Florida Polytechnic Game Expo on Sat. December 4.

     This game among others will be ready to play at the Expo, vote for the game you liked the most and I hope you'll vote for this one.
